title: All-Inclusive Beachfront Paradise with Premium Dining & Unlimited Drinks
description: Sri Lanka boasts a rich culture and rugged beauty that is well worth discovering. Experience beachfront beauty at Centara Ceysands Resort & Spa. Nestled between the emerald Indian Ocean and the Bentota River, this all-inclusive holiday offers up daily buffet breakfast, your choice of daily buffet or three-course lunch, nightly themed buffet dinner, daily high tea and unlimited local drinks including beer, wine, cocktails and spirits available throughout the day. Plus, indulge in some additional decadent dining experiences and a one-way land and river transfer from Colombo’s International Airport, located just under two hours’ drive away. With a children’s swimming pool, a watersports centre and a Kids Club, the little ones can keep busy too.
location_description: Centara Ceysands Resort & Spa Sri Lanka OLD
offer_address: Aluthgama - Mathugama Rd, Bentota, Sri Lanka

title: Exotic Sri Lankan Beachfront Escape
description: Experience the exotic delights and dazzling beauty of Sri Lanka with four nights of beachfront indulgence at the Centara Ceysands Resort & Spa including daily buffet breakfasts, nightly themed buffet dinners with three hours of unlimited house wines, local beers, house spirits and selected cocktails, plus a relaxing 30-minute massage for two adults.
location_description: Centara Ceysands Resort & Spa Sri Lanka - Nov 2018
offer_address: Aluthgama - Mathugama Rd, Bentota, Sri Lanka

title: Exotic Sri Lankan Beachfront Escape
description: Experience the exotic delights and dazzling beauty of Sri Lanka with six nights of beachfront indulgence at the Centara Ceysands Resort & Spa including daily buffet breakfasts, nightly themed buffet dinners with three hours of unlimited house wines, local beers, house spirits and selected cocktails, plus a relaxing 60-minute massage for two adults.
location_description: Centara Ceysands Resort & Spa Sri Lanka - Nov 2018
offer_address: Aluthgama - Mathugama Rd, Bentota, Sri Lanka

title: Beachfront Sri Lanka Escape with Daily Dining, Massages & Daily Free-Flow Drinks
description:
Experience Sri Lanka's beachfront beauty at this tranquil retreat, nestled between the Indian Ocean and Bentota River. Garlanded by sun, sand and sea, lush mangroves and palm groves, this island paradise offers the perfect balance between rest, rejuvenation and a little adventure.

With direct beach access, you can lounge in the sun or discover all the major attractions of the resort town of Bentota. Visit the famous Brief Garden, take it slow with a river safari on Madu Ganga, or pay a visit to the adorable turtles at Kosgoda Sea Turtle Conservation Project - the choice is yours.Get swept away with vibrant Asian flavours or international cuisine at one of five onsite restaurants and bars, or indulge in a sumptious cocktail at the swim-up Pool Bar before unwinding with a treatment at SPA Cenvaree while the children are entertained at the Kids' Club. With two shimmering pools, a sauna and steam room, and plenty of fun and games for the little ones, you may not even want to leave this tropical haven.
location_description: Centara Ceysands Resort & Spa Sri Lanka
offer_address: Mathugama Rd, Aluthgama, Bentota, Sri Lanka

title: Boutique Bentota Beachfront Hideaway with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner & One Child Stays Free
description:
Lapped by the waves of the shimmering Indian Ocean and lulled by the meandering Benthara River, this five-star oasis, nestled in tropical Bentota, is one of Sri Lanka's best-kept secrets. The epitome of designer luxury, the resort draws inspiration from the majestic Galle Fort and is an ode to the nation's rich cultural heritage, reflected in the property's lush gardens and aesthetic interiors.

Discover the region's verdant landscapes, explore historic Galapatha Temple or take a memorable trip to nearby Bentota Turtle Hatchery, where endangered turtle species are protected.

Back at your resort, experience a fusion of Asian, Italian and Western flavours at Zest and Ottimo restaurant, sample fresh seafood at Sea Meats Spice, sip on signature cocktails at Fuze bar and cool off in between swimming laps with cocktails at Drench pool bar.
offer_address: Galle Road, Bentota, Western Province 80500, Sri Lanka

title: Sri Lanka Beachfront Family Escape with Daily Breakfast, Lunch or Dinner & Daily Free-Flow Drinks
description:
Experience beachfront beauty at Centara Ceysands Resort & Spa Sri Lanka, a gorgeous retreat nestled between the Indian Ocean and Bentota River. This exotic paradise is ideally positioned for experiencing Sri Lanka's famous tropical vibes, serene coastal ambience and adventurous spirit. 

Only a 1.5-hour drive from Colombo International Airport, Centara Ceysands Resort & Spa Sri Lanka is garlanded by sun, sand and sea, lush mangroves and palm groves, with idyllic Ventura Beach mere steps away. Facilities include a sprawling beach-facing pool, luxurious spa, fitness centre, and enticing drinking and dining venues. From Centara Ceysands Resort & Spa Sri Lanka, the region's major tourist attractions are within easy reach, including Galle Fort and Kosgoda Turtle Hatchery. Whether travelling as a couple, with friends or family, this resort promises a relaxing holiday with a dash of classic Sri Lankan beauty and elegance.
location_description: Centara Ceysands Resort & Spa Sri Lanka
offer_address: Mathugama Rd, Aluthgama, Bentota, Sri Lanka

title: Iconic Lakeside Sri Lanka Country House with Restaurant & Pool
description: Discover tranquility at Lunuganga, a boutique estate nestled within the verdant gardens of Bentota. This architectural masterpiece, once the country estate of renowned architect Geoffrey Bawa, offers guests an ideal location just an hour's drive from Galle Fort, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, and the local flavours at Bentota Bazaar. Come lunch or dinner, the hotel's restaurant serves up authentic Sri Lankan cuisine, using fresh ingredients sourced from the estate's own organic garden.
